thread.title: Vigilante pedophile hunters slammed by police | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Vigilante pedophile hunters slammed by police | Daily Mail Online

author: Jennifer Smith For Dailymail.Com
title: Vigilante pedophile hunters slammed by police | Daily Mail Online
text: 'Fame hungry' Canadian group of vigilante pedophile hunters is slammed for naming and shaming innocent men and interfering with police work Creep Catchers in Canada has been accused of causing more harm than good Police say its vigilantes get in the way of their investigations into pedophilia Members pose as children to set up meetings with adults which they then film The footage is shared on Facebook and YouTube and attracts thousands of views Some men say they have been wrongly named and shamed by the group It also received criticism for the suicide of a transgender woman they featured Organizers were equally condemned for filming and sharing video of a man with cerebral palsy they said was a predator Published: 18:35 GMT, 19 February 2017 | Updated: 18:35 GMT, 19 February 2017 14 shares
